text:
e="preserve">"Mujahideen" (') is the plural form of "mujahid" (), the Arabic term for one engaged in "jihad" (literally, "struggle"). This is an English term to describe guerrilla-type militant groups led by the Islamist Afghan fighters in the Soviet–Afghan War. It now extends to other jihadist groups in other countries.
The English term "jihadists" is also related to the mujahideen.
